page.title: 03Our Homes
page.content: I live in Poolhouse Rd.,Wombourne. The house is called Carisbrooke. It is 70 years old and is black and white with a gravel drive. Wombourne has new housing estates which were fields except for a row of houses where I live. Behind my house I have a field. It is protected greenbelt There is a new swimming pool at Ounsdale. My next door neighbour has a swimming pool. I have one brother,three dogs, a cat and a goldfish. Sam. I live in the country in The Hollybush Inn, at Ebstree. Around the pub are fields of crops and meadows. We own 6 acres of land. The pub was built in 1842. At the moment we have builders in who are knocking down walls and re-building. We have another house at Perton. This used to be an airfield and an army base. Glenn.
